name: Supermoon: Planet Protector
description:
For billions of years, the Moon has shielded the Earth from asteroid impacts, and the Earth's magnetic field has protected its atmosphere from solar storms.

In this game, control the Moon and absorb asteroid impacts, and watch as life evolves on Earth the stronger its atmosphere becomes (with a little magnetic help).

The meteors will have various temporary effects on the Moon to complicate the gameplay for added fun, and make the satisfying conclusion taste even sweeter!

A complete, layered game with charming and beautiful graphics and music.
